# catalystcenter_floors (Data Source)

This data source can read the Floors.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "catalystcenter_floors" "example" {
  id = "76d24097-41c4-4558-a4d0-a8c07ac08470"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The id of the object

### Read-Only

- `floors` (Attributes Set) List of floors (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--floors))

<a id="nestedatt--floors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `floors`

Read-Only:

- `floor_number` (Number) Floor number
- `height` (Number) Height
- `id` (String) The id of the floor
- `length` (Number) Length
- `name` (String) Floor name
- `parent_id` (String) The parent ID of the floor
- `parent_name_hierarchy` (String) Parent hierarchical name (e.g., Global/USA/Building1)
- `rf_model` (String) The RF model
- `units_of_measure` (String) The unit of measurement
- `width` (Number) Width
